review: It was good experience with overall treatment went for 6 months period, Doctor was very much friendly, he explained each and every process in detail and given overall good treatment. i am writing review on behalf of my Mom, complete tooth replacement process for both up and down jaw, lower jaw full replacement is permanent solution which we tried was titanium. It is one of big surgery which involves lot of testing before implantation. After all tests success the under jaw replacement was completed for monthly iteration. Because of surgery all infected area get recovered some time so surgery + teeth replacement totally took almost 6 to 8 months with multiple review. Cost also comparatively manageable compared to other dental hospitals. Also they are doing temporary and permanent both teeth replacement. Thanks doctor for the good treatment.

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Impacted Tooth Removal,
review: Painless and quick tooth removal.Root canal treatment done properly.Problem was explained well.Post operative care explained well

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been a regular since 2017 and have done multiple RCTs and surgeries. Doctor is very consultative in approach and explains pros and cons of different approaches. He optimizes for long term in his treatment in order to protect teeth and overall health./cost. 

He is also very friendly and approachable with questions or concerns. 

I highly recommend.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Tooth filling and insert cap took time for complete procedure step wise.Doctor sir spent time and done filling with lot of patience.For my case treatment is little bit expensive than expected.overall satisfaction matters.I am feeling good.Next time visit need to take quotation and start the process at the beginning itself for tooth problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very good treatment they provided. I will recommend people to visit the clinic and the required treatments.

Good treatment 
Friendly treatment 
On time treatment 
Good explanation before starting treatment 
Over all good in all aspects

I am from Malaysia and in Chennai for a holiday. I decided to do teeth bleaching treatment over in Chennai. I goggled and viewed numbers of dental clinics over here. I am very particular in choosing any treatments for my own self or others. I read all the reviews and feedback from for most of the dental clinics here and decided to choose Lakshmi Dental. I was treated by Dr. Subramoniam. The moment I stepped in the clinic, I was assist by the clinic's assistant. Friendly and pleasant personality. I waited for my turn and fortunately treatment  received immediately after the Doctor 's consultation even though clinic was about to close. Treatment was done patiently by Dr.Subramoniam as he wanted it to be done perfectly.  For this very first treatment I can see a big difference on my teeth colour. I was happy and decided to do 2nd treatment the following day to enhance it and I was allowed to do so in the evening to give some time gap for the teeth after 1st treatment. A good advice!. Before going back Dr has briefed me in detail something about advance technology that the clinic is providing. I discovered something NEW then!!!! . I decided to undergo with the treatment and has booked the date, as that was what I was looking for all this while but I don't know what the treatment is called. 
That particular night I was happy and keep looking at mirror every 2 hours because my teeth finally looks whiter. 
This good treatment was received with a VERY REASONABLE charge. 
I returned back the following day as scheduled for 2nd treatment and treatment done on time. THE RESULT WAS REALLY AMAZING. Dr. has used a latest whitening/bleaching product in market for this visit. I can't believed when I saw the mirror. "SUPER" the only word I could say. This is not to over praise the Dr but the truth. I was once again being advised how to do proper care and what to avoid to keep the teeth as it is now and not to forget to do follow up on polishing on right time. The 2nd treatment was considered as a follow up by Dr Subramoniam and it was F.O.C. Therefore what ever GOOD FEEDBACKS by/patients that I read in goggle's review given by earlier patients were TRUE. GREAT SERVICE AND HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR EVERYONE. AND NOW I CAN GO BACK WITH GREAT SMILE TO MALAYSIA. THANK U LAKSHMI DENTAL AND DR. SUBRAMONIAM FOR THE SERVICE. TERIMA KASIH.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited this clinic with pain in my molars and i told them i had pain in both sides while chewing. I was surprised at the diagnosis by the doctor ma‚Äôam as she told me that both the pains due to different cause. One side was just because of the cold and cough which needed no treatment and they did not misguide to have those teeth treated. Of course other side pain was due to dental issues and needed Root Canal treatment. Even for that they started treatment only for one tooth to start with instead of going for RCT for both teeth. They explained me the whole issue and gave recommendations for teeth hygiene. I had my first RCT done today morning and the treatment was done with utmost precision and painless as possible. My wife had some dental issues few weeks back and had a very good experience with the clinic and she recommended me to visit them for my issues. Generally most of the hospitals and clinics will ask you to go for expensive tests and offer expensive treatment for cause unknown or misguide. I am very happy to find such good doctors to address our dental problems after searching for 2 years since we relocated to Chennai. If you are looking for genuine doctors who will never misguide and ask you to go for expensive treatments then this is the place to consult and get yourself treated.
reply_text: I can't thank you enough for this wonderful heartfelt review  that you both have given us. Much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent, cordial doctor. Very transparent educative economical worthy. Very nice reception time conscious explaining every details in a way to understand in simple language. Every step is explained and it's cost. Also the time frame of the treatment and suitable convenient timings for appointments. Totally not a hospital atmosphere but a family spirit. Wish them all success

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Impaction / Impacted Tooth Extraction,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Fillings,
review: Did wisdom tooth extraction, impaction surgery and dental fillings. I had a wonderful experience with both Dr Subramoniam and Dr Suganya and I was more than happy with the results. They were both extremely professional in their work and warm and friendly in their attitude. Explained patiently what they were doing as and when they were working on my teeth. Very welcoming to concerns and doubts I had. They have all the latest necessary equipment to deliver the best dental treatment. I had a great time visiting the place to fix my issues and I'll be back for regular checks. Not to mention affordable too unlike other places. The nurses present too are very caring and helpful towards the patients. Definitely recommend.
reply_text: Hi, thank you very much for your wonderful feedback. Much appreciated.

review: I take this opportunity to thank Dr. Subramaniom and Dr. Sukanya, for giving wonderful treatment viz. Implants where necessary and advised me to go for prestine attachment (cost effective) where, they were not able to take support of other teeth, and whereall the bridging is necessary. In brief, I would strongly suggest if any of you have dental problem to consult Dr. Subramaniom once, then you will be able to understand how much knowledge they have,  courtesy they show upon, the cost effective treatment they suggest to suit our budget etc...
reply_text: Thank you very much for your kind words of appreciation.  It was really a pleasure  . You have trusted us one hundred percent and that encouraged us to deliver the best that we could.

review:
A gentle doctor much younger to my children, was so kind and understanding.
Initially I felt he was a bit hesitant to treat me , because of my age.
I gave him courage and vice-versa. 
Our interaction was so cordial, like one between a mother and a son.
It's the support given by my hubby apart from the encouragement by the lovely staff at Laxmi Dental , made it possible.
My friends and relatives were taken aback , when they came to know of the achievement by the Dentist.
I am running 76 and am so pleased to have my teeth again.
I owe my gratitude, appreciation and regards to the lovely Dentist couple.
May their tribe increase.
reply_text: Thanks for your wonderful feedback mam. Gives loads of energy to do better.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Had a great experience. Would definitely recommend to my friends and family. Was taken care properly.

I strongly recommend this Dr for all your dental issues. He is simple infact both the couple are so friendly, affable , personal consultation will be given.  The clinic itself is clean and simple. There is no cosmetic approach nor their  clinic. No corporate atmosphere. But you will get personal satisfied treatment for all your dental problems. The main thing here is that it all comes in reasonable, affordable amount. 
I took my 75 years old  father for his problems due to againg. Also my son who is 13 years old got a perfect alingment of his teeth, got confident about his smile , which will be his gift I can give for his entire life. 

I personally satisfied and happy as both of them are friendly with my father and my son and of course with me, which make me feel like all of friends and kind I will recommend them strongly for Dental. 

I thank them for their service and wish them all the very best for all their future endeavours.
Thank you Dr, God bless you and be your side always through out your life to continue your service like this. 

You are not motivated by the money, Money will follow you. You will have a peace of life and Happiness with your approach and service. Now a days that is missing in the present generations. 
Thank you.
reply_text: Thank you very much sir for taking time to give this wonderful review  . Much appreciated...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Removed my wisdom tooth. very friendly and explained all the procedures and post treatment pain. Fees is reasonable. Also given phone number to call him at any time for after surgery issues. I strongly suggest this dentist.

Dr.Subramoniam was very polite and professional. On the first visit, he explained me what went wrong with my teeth and what has to be done. Being a broken tooth, the wisdom tooth on upper right jaw, the only and better option was to remove it. When I asked on the shape, face look after tooth removal, he gave a confidence that this should not affect any shape or look. I am relaxed and convinced with his answers and approach. Later on the 2nd visit, the procedures for tooth removal were done in smooth manner. I am better now. Thanks to Dr and team there. Thanks to Practo.

review: Everyone has a fear of going to the dentist. However, at Lakshmi Dental Clinic, the doctors are experienced, professional, and patient. They take the time to clearly explain what the problem is and the course of action. They calm your fears. There are no hassles in booking appointments. Everything is handled quite professionally.

The doctor made me very comfortable and explained the procedure clearly. The actual extraction procedure went very smoothly. I followed the precautions advised and i was able to recover in 2 days. Will recommend this doctor for his experience and patient friendliness.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is very good in explaining what is the issue after analysis and made us understand which treatment is good for us..He also made patients understand what will be the impact of the treatment..clear explanation of issues and impact of treatment is much needed before undergoing any treatment in which iam very much satisfied.

Explaining the issue in detail to the patient and here you can get in detail. Directly jumping to diagnosis and treatment is like autocratic attitude toward patients like an engine or motor is not acceptable. Here dr Subramaniam explains the issue to the fullest satisfaction.

I will suggest this clinic for any dental problems and we will come out with problem resolved.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,

Rest assured you are in very safe hands. His colleagues are also equally competent and safe hands .All staffs are very cordial. Overall it's a very pleasant experience. Thanks a lot Doctor !!!Wish him all the best in all his future endeavours

review: He became our family Dentist. I took root canal treatment for 5 teeth on different periods in 4 years. He is keeping records of the patients to follow treatment. I am a CAG patient. Before taking treatment with the Dentist I was asked to get the advice from the Cardiologist. So I consulted the Cardiologist. As per the advice he took much care to treat me in my 70 th Age. In addition he is treating my wife 65, Daughter 35, Son 28, Grand Daughters 10 & 6 respectively.

Iam 75 years old with lots of dental problems and need replacement of lower teeth's. I am had to travel from tambaram to porur but distance didnt matter as i was referred to this clinic by my close friend .Doctor was very experienced and is very gentle and felt no pain or any other problem during the entire treatment which lasted for more than a month.I have referred  my entire family to him and lakshmi dental care .

Doctor explained my dental problems clearly and I have  got my root canal treatment and cap recently with him. Very satisfied with the overall experience . will come back for getting a flexible denture  he has recommended .  the entire team polite and friendly. Cost is nominal compared to many other clinics.

I'm really happy with the way the staff  treated me. I had referred a few of my friends from Canada and US. They were also offered the same level of care and treatment with the

Very cooperative and good .effective treatment..given enough advance time for appointment.already my  daughter had effectivetreatmentunder   their care.she has advised me to approach this clinic..four members from our family had very effective treatment in the same clinic.

The doctors approach to the patient is very good. On the first visit itself he clearly explains about the problem and about the treatment and also the cost, so that the patient can made them ready for the treatment. Overall a very good care for the patients.

Doctor Subramoniam is polite and friendly. I visited  lakshmi dental care  for complete replacement of my upper and lower teeth. He placed implants and did more than 10 root cana. I will recommend all my friends to him for any dental problems.
